resources.string: A fire started out in the most eastern district of the city My King and its getting out of control for the fire patrol and the townsfolk. The fire patrol seek your permission to open the eastern floodgate to quell the flames?

string-array.name: event_picker
string-array.item: e1Åc4Åi1/Your excellency,I have lately received some reports that there an issue with rats down as the mill./We can not stop the rats for being rats.¤food#-20/Hire some men to eradicate these vermin.¤gold#0/Just gather up some cats to handle it.¤food#-10/Tell the townsfolk that for every 10 rats that they can bring in theres a reward.¤happ#10Ögold#-20/4¤none

e2Åc4Åi1/Your excellency. Some farms in the western area are having problems with meeting up this month harvest tax./Tell the farmer the the kingdom cant handle to lower the tax and that they have to make due for now.¤happ#-10Ögold#-5/Ease their taxings this month but only this month.¤gold#-10Öfood#-10 /We can not have such problems in our farms, lower the harvest tax until the farms can handle higher taxings.¤food#-10Öhapp#5/My kingdom demands its harvest more now than ever, increase the tax so my people do not go hungry.¤happ#-10Öfood#-10/4¤none

e3p1Åc4Åi1/Your excellency, Royal Family wishes to expand the your lands into the West. Onto the fertile land that now belongs to the farmers and their brethren who feed there. They ask for your approval of this./Those land are not for the family to take.¤happ#0/Remove the entire community and build a palace on it for the family.¤happ#-15Ögold#10/Let the farming community keep the piece of land but add a tax for it. Distribute the excess to the family .¤gold#10Öhapp#-15/Usurp the land, create a palace and hire the farmers under the land owned by the royals.¤happ#-15Ögold#-10/4¤e3p2

e3p2Åc4Åi1/Your excellency, The farmers of the West have begun to throw meat onto Palace walls, setting the crops on fire and injuring royals!/This matter have to solve itself.¤happ#10Ögold#-10/Set up a meeting with the head of the farmers and the royals to discuss the land.¤happ#10Öfood#-15/Banish all farmers from the land for riot and bad behavior.¤gold#10Öhapp#-15/Bring in the army to fight them off but make no decision of the land.¤happ#10Ögold#-10/4¤e3p3

e3p3Åc4Åi1/Your excellency, Due to the riots between the farmers and the Royals, almost all the crops were destroyed and our food storage is running low do to it./What is done is done.¤happ#-15Öfood#-15/Import food from the neighbouring country.¤happ#10Ögold#-15/Make the farmers suffer for their decision and pay for the food.¤gold#10Öhapp#-15/Kill all the farmers for this treachery.¤happ#-10Öfood#-10/4¤none

e4p1Åc4Åi1/Your excellency, I have received word that the showers are belated for over two fortnights, the harvest may wither if we do not act in haste!/Pray the Lord and may the heavens quench the thirst of our soils!¤food#-15/Gather townsfolk to irrigate the fields.¤happ#-10Öfood#10/Punish the wicked of this kingdom, as they are responsible for this terrible fate!¤food#-5Öhapp#-15/Ration the resources, one pint of water and a fistful o flour per household!¤happ#-5Öfood#5/4¤e4p2

e4p1Åc4Åi1/Your excellency, the country is plagued by drought, the harvest will not deliver!/My Kingdom has survived worse!¤food#-5Öhapp#-10/Gather townsfolk to irrigate the fields.¤happ#-15Öfood#5/Bargain grains from the neighbouring kingdom.¤food#10Ögold#-15/none/3¤none

e30p1Åc3Åi1/Good Sir, villains with their vile daggers! Roaming clean through the bounds of our fair kingdom! Shall I put this business into my own dispatch?/We can waste our gold and such filth, the outskirts can handle themselves.¤food#-5Öhapp#-10/We can not have robbers roaming around in my kingdom! Take as many men you need.¤happ#10Ögold#5/Set up a reward for capturing them.¤gold#-5Öhapp#-15/none/3¤e30p2

e30p2Åc3Åi1/Good Sir, the dungeons repleted with villains, I stand at your command!/Let is be for now. Its better to have them in there then out here with the people.¤food#-5Ögold#-5/They are just filth Ser, hang them all!¤happ#-5Öfood#10/Make them work down in the quarries as punishment instead¤gold#10Öhapp#-15/none/3¤none
